links.*: The Battle of the Pelennor Fields

wikitext.*:
'''The Tall''' was a title used of [[Maedhros]]<ref>{{S|Index}}, ''Maedhros''</ref> the [[Sons of Fëanor|Son of Fëanor]], [[Galdor (Lord of Dor-lómin)|Galdor]] of [[Dor-lómin]],<ref>{{S|Index}}, ''Galdor''</ref> [[Elendil]] of [[Númenor]],<ref>{{S|Index}}, ''Elendil''</ref> [[Húrin (Warden of the Keys)|Húrin]], Warden of the Keys of [[Minas Tirith]],<ref>{{RK|V6}}</ref> and [[Boromir]], son of [[Denethor II]].<ref>Only by [[Aragorn]] in the [[Song of Boromir]]: "Have you seen Boromir the Tall by moon or by starlight?" ({{TT|III1}}).</ref>

==Etymology==
The Sindarin translation of "the Tall" is given as '''''Orchal'''''.<ref>{{WJ|I}}, p. 305, note 48</ref>
